title: Anime Club
purpose: The purpose of the FHSS Anime club is to promote and improve the communication skills between students of any grades using Japanese pop culture as a foundation, as well as the building of long lasting memories and connections. Society is built on social engagement, so we strive to increase the availability of such events.
typicalWeek: Weekly meetings are on Wednesdays from 3:00pm - 4:30pm. Each meeting will start by watching 2 or 3 episodes from an anime that the club members voted on at the beginning of each semester. After, we would play some games including; Jackbox, Garticphone, and other fun activities.
schedule: We meet on Wednesdays at After School. Come Join us!
